matador.business_logic

Class Konto

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador.business_logic.Konto

  • public class Konto
extends Object
    Konto used to represent the balance of the Player.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    Player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Konto()
      Constructor that initially sets the balance to 10000.
      Konto(int balance)
      Constructor that sets the balance to the provided balance.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int amount)
        Adds the provided amount to the Konto balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - int to be added to balance.

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(int amount)
        Subtracts the provided amount from Konto. Only subtracts if the resulting balance will not be negative, otherwise balance is set to zero. Returns True if the full amount could be subtracted.
        Parameters:
        amount - int to be subtracted.
        Returns:
        True if amount did not exceed balance.

      • getBalance

        public int getBalance()
        Returns the balance.
        Returns:
        int balance.

      • setBalance

        public void setBalance(int balance)
        Sets the balance to the provided balance.
        Parameters:
        balance - int to set the balance to.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
